column4: is it possible to install vmware-server on desktop systems (having a wm) or does it only work on servers?
you can install any services on a desktop machine. theres not a lot of 'differance'  in desktop and server.. (well theres some, but not that differnt)
the 'server install' has some different tweaks, and settin gs by default - is the 'core' differance.
you should be able to access it as you normally do.
